full_summary:
# Fluid Coolers Tender Announcement

## Solicitation Number
W8482-230510/A

## Publication Date
23 November 2022

## Tender Closing Date
20 January 2023 at 14:00:00

## Amendment Number
2

## Description
This is a request for proposal (RFP) for the supply of fluid coolers and related components to the Department of National Defence. The tender submission deadline has been extended to 20 January 2023.

## Items to be Supplied
The following items are required:

* Core assembly, fluid cooler, NSN 2930-99-229-6237
* Bonnet, fluid cooler, PSCN 4420-20-A0Y-3145
* Joint, PSCN 5330-20-A0Y-3148
* Stud, PSCN 5307-20-A0Y-3136
* Nut, heavy hex, PSCN 5310-20-A0Y-3135
* Hose, non-metallic, flexible, NSN 4720-00-194-8911
* Adapter, straight, tube to hose, NSN 4730-00-052-4834
* Elbow, hose, NSN 4730-00-504-7509
* Lubricating oil, air compressor, NSN 9150-20-000-0034
* Filter, fluid, NSN 4330-99-613-2947
* Cooler, fluid, industrial, NSN 4420-01-419-2871

## Quantities and Deliveries
The required items must be delivered to the following locations:

* CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia:
	+ Core assembly, fluid cooler, 12 units
	+ Bonnet, fluid cooler, 4 units
	+ Joint, 70 units
	+ Stud, 75 units
	+ Nut, heavy hex, 150 units
	+ Hose, non-metallic, flexible, 480 feet
	+ Adapter, straight, tube to hose, 200 units
	+ Elbow, hose, 35 units
	+ Lubricating oil, air compressor, 14 units
	+ Filter, fluid, 14 units
	+ Cooler, fluid, industrial, 14 units
* CFB Esquimalt, Colombie-Britannique:
	+ Core assembly, fluid cooler, 10 units
